attributes.action: Propose the entire Irish nation for the Nobel Peace Prize.
attributes.background: For the past two years, after centuries of racism, arrogance, contempt, indifference and now Brexit, the Irish have been consistently courteous, reasoned and constructive towards the UK as they try to defend their country after a mad decision by a foreign nation from which they too will only suffer.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours and appointments. 

You could make this suggestion to your own MP. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
